DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety , bio-distribution , radiation dosimetry ; optimize Imaging Protocol GEH120714 ( 18F ) Injection . Study recruit healthy volunteer participant relapse remit multiple sclerosis .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Safety , Bio-distribution , Radiation Dosimetry Optimize Imaging Protocol GEH120714 ( 18F ) Injection Healthy Volunteers Participants With Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis ( rrMS ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Participants : The subject clinically normal acceptable medical history physical examination screening . The subject acceptable kidney function ( eGFR > 60 mL/min/1.73m2 ) administration Gadolinium . The subject translocator protein ( TSPO ) platelet assay conduct documented result . Inclusion Criteria healthy volunteer : The subject clinical history sign neurological impairment . The subject normal MRI without central white white matter lesion . Inclusion Criteria specific participant relapse remit result sclerosis ( rrMS ) : Subject previous diagnosis rrMS , present ( ) clinically active disease time screening , preferentially , ( b ) clinically active disease time screen least one gadoliniumenhanced lesion MRI . The subject screening MRI scan sufficient quality Volume Interest ( VOI ) definition coalignment Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) . General Exclusion Criteria participant : The subject contraindication Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) . The subject know allergy Gadolinium contrast agent . The subject receive significant ionising radiation exposure clinical trial medical examination last 12 month . Exclusion Criteria specific healthy volunteer : The subject family history multiple sclerosis ( MS ) . The subject undergoing monitoring occupational ionising radiation exposure . Exclusion Criteria specific participant remit multiple sclerosis ( rrMS ) : The subject past history cerebrovascular disease vasculitis . The subject history head injury prolong coma .
